recipe_name: Spicy Air Fryer Pork Chops with Apricot Glaze
ingredients: 4 cups water, 2 tablespoons kosher salt, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 4 (5 ounce) bone-in center loin pork chops, about 3/4-inch thick, 1 teaspoon chili powder, or to taste, 1 teaspoon onion powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon white pepper
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 7%, Saturated Fat 2g 9%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 3517mg 153%, Total Carbohydrate 40g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 17g, Vitamin C 10mg 49%, Calcium 48mg 4%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 309mg 7%
